mapper.select: select count(id) from ( select b.id,b.name,b.email,b.gender,b.phone, a.authority,m.nickname,m.intro,m.pfilename,m.bfilename from bmembers b full outer join auth a on b.id=a.id full outer join mprofile m on m.id=b.id where authority='ROLE_MEMBER' )

select * from ( select b.id,b.name,b.email,b.gender,b.phone, a.authority,m.nickname,m.intro,m.pfilename,m.bfilename,rownum from bmembers b full outer join auth a on b.id=a.id full outer join mprofile m on m.id=b.id where authority='ROLE_MEMBER' and rownum<=#{selectAuthor} order by rownum desc ) where rownum=1
